meanings.sent1: She felt nervy before the big presentation.
meanings.sent2: The nervy firefighter rushed into the burning building to save the cat.
meanings.sent3: Despite feeling nervy, she stood tall and faced her fears.
meanings.sent4: His nervy decision to speak up in class paid off with praise from the teacher.
meanings.sent5: The nervy knight fearlessly battled the dragon to protect the kingdom.

meanings.sent1: The nervy cat hissed at anyone who came too close.
meanings.sent2: Her nervy reaction to the noise showed her irritation.
meanings.sent3: The nervy squirrel scolded the birds for disturbing its nap.
meanings.sent4: The nervy customer complained about every little detail of the meal.
meanings.sent5: His nervy behavior in traffic led to honking and frustration from other drivers.

meanings.sent1: The nervy atmosphere in the room made everyone uneasy.
meanings.sent2: His nervy hands trembled as he waited for the test results.
meanings.sent3: The nervy silence between them was broken by a sudden loud noise.
meanings.sent4: The nervy anticipation before the announcement was palpable.
meanings.sent5: The nervy energy in the stadium was electric as the final play unfolded.
